roomDescription: Indulge in unparalleled sophistication in our Luxury Room, featuring a spacious layout with elegant furnishings and breathtaking views. The room boasts a plush king-sized bed, premium linens, and a seating area for ultimate comfort. Modern amenities include a large flat-screen TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a mini-bar stocked with gourmet treats. The en-suite bathroom is a haven of relaxation, offering a deep soaking tub, rain shower, and luxury toiletries. Perfect for romantic getaways or upscale stays, this room ensures a memorable experience.
specialOffers: Complimentary bottle of wine upon arrival

roomDescription: Discover the perfect blend of style and functionality in our Small Suite, designed for travelers seeking extra space and comfort. The suite features a cozy living area, a queen-sized bed with soft linens, and contemporary decor. Guests can enjoy modern amenities such as a flat-screen TV, coffee maker, and high-speed Wi-Fi. The en-suite bathroom includes a walk-in shower, fluffy towels, and complimentary toiletries. Ideal for couples or solo travelers, this suite offers a tranquil escape with everything you need for a delightful stay.

Our Single Room is thoughtfully designed to provide maximum comfort for solo travelers. Featuring a comfortable single bed with premium linens, a work desk, and ample lighting, this room is perfect for both business and leisure stays. Guests can enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and complimentary tea and coffee facilities. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a refreshing shower, soft towels, and basic amenities. With its compact yet functional layout, this room offers a cozy retreat at an affordable price.

Create unforgettable memories with your loved ones in our spacious Family Room, designed to accommodate families comfortably. This room features a queen-sized bed and two additional single beds, making it ideal for parents and children. A cozy seating area and ample storage space ensure a stress-free stay. Modern conveniences include a flat-screen TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a mini-fridge. The en-suite bathroom offers a bathtub, shower, and complimentary toiletries, perfect for families with young kids. This room ensures a delightful and relaxing experience for everyone.

Relax and unwind in our Double Room, featuring two comfortable twin beds or a single queen-sized bed, perfect for friends or couples. This room is equipped with modern amenities including a flat-screen TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a coffee maker to enhance your stay. The roomâ€™s tasteful decor and large windows create a bright and inviting atmosphere. The en-suite bathroom includes a walk-in shower, fresh towels, and complimentary toiletries. This room offers great value and comfort for travelers looking for a peaceful retreat.
